Emmanuelle Béart

Birthday:
1963-08-14
Birthplace:
St. Tropez, Var, Provence-Alpes-Côte d'Azur, France

​ Emmanuelle Béart (born 14 August 1963) is a French film actress, who has appeared in over 50 film and television productions since 1972. Béart won a César Award for Best Supporting Actress in the film Manon des Sources (1986). She has been nominated a further seven times for Most Promising Actress and Best Actress. Emmanuelle Béart, licensed under CC-BY-SA
